Detailed Description

This class is a vertex buffer helper class used to create and fill vertex buffers.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Moo::VertexBuffer::VertexBuffer (  )  [inline]

Member Function Documentation

void Moo::VertexBuffer::addToPreloadList (  )  [inline]

This method adds the vertex buffer to the preload list in the render context.

This causes the buffer to have its preload method called in the next few frames, so that it is uploaded to video memory. This is only useful for managed pool resources.
